## Exercise 4

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

The indented line is rendered as a code block instead of normal text.

Indentation with four spaces tells RMarkdown to treat the line as code.

This can be confusing for readers, because plain text may accidentally look like code.
